website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful, well-made lamps that suit most rooms. The best the brand has to offer.
pros: Durable ceramic base with a classic shape and neutral color that fits most décor
The lampshade detailing has a tailored feel
cons: Too large and somewhat tall for small areas, and a bit on the pricey side

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful but make sure to measure out where you plan ...
customer_reviews.text: FYI-The color is MUCH more white than it looks on screen. These are more pear-white. I thought it would be more gray. These are also quite LARGE. They are beautiful but make sure to measure out where you plan to put them and don't forget about the circumference of the shades too!. I'm not sure if I will keep them as I was thinking they had more color but if you want a warmer white these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamps!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for lamps for a long time. The lamps look nice in our living room and the white brings out the color between dark brown leather couches/loveset. The shades came damaged (krinkled) but was able to get two more delivered and they are perfect this time. Would recommend these lamps and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect until...
customer_reviews.text: One of the switches broke in the first week. I only need one replacement lamp but it looks like I am getting two. Need to ship broken lamp back is annoying. Come on amazon. The lamp is garbage not worth sending back.
customer_reviews.author: jmd08

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful (if they are not damaged in shipping))
customer_reviews.text: The sole reason I'm giving it less than 5 stars is because the lamps arrived completely broken and the lamp shades were bent. Seeing as we desperately needed new lamps, I was extremely disappointed. Amazon was very professional and gave me a full refund. However, from what we could see that wasn't broken, they were absolutely fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: A. Schortgen

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL HEAVY LAMPS
customer_reviews.text: Classic look, the bases are so well made. The shades were perfect and the packaging excellent. Also I received them quickly and am so impressed with the quality. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: N. Basile

customer_reviews.title: Just Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I chose another lamp shade, but these lamps are absolutely gorgeous. They’re big, heavy and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mompoint

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and gives  a lot  of light!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and very well made lamps! They are heavy which is good for me. I wanted some color in my dark living room and these brightened it up! Nice height too! Nice thing too, was the bulbs came with them! No searching for anything !
customer_reviews.author: SharonShuler

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL>>>BUT NOT TEAL
customer_reviews.text: Stunning mid-century modern Lamp..NOT TEAL ..Tag said Light Blue..NOT Light Blue either..THEY ARE A TRUE DARK SEA-FOAM GREEN...GET YOUR COLORS STRAIGHT PEOPLE !!! Goregeous non the less... Gives off tons of light..HIGH QUALITY LAMP especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice m nenedjian

customer_reviews.title: Statement
customer_reviews.text: I love these lamps. They add a soft yet beautiful elegance to our nightstands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamps
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my mother she love them so much they look beautiful in her bedroom and their tall which is what I wanted for her buy you'll love them
customer_reviews.author: ROBYN

customer_reviews.title: Now that I received the correct color, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Was originally sent the wrong color (ordered Navy, received Orange). Sent back and received the correct lamps within 2 days. So happy with them - I have been searching for similar lamps for weeks and everything I found in stores were well over $200+ . Very well packaged, easy to put together, included lightbulbs! and just BEAUTIFUL.
customer_reviews.author: mjr

customer_reviews.title: We are so pleased
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are large and work well placed on side tables in our vacation living room. The are heavy. They are prettier in person than in the pictures. They were simple to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: 1benji

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking!
customer_reviews.text: Love these nice, heavy, well made lamps. Just perfect. Packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: Shel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamps!
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I expected but a great addition to my new apartment. I took a star off because of damage to the shades. I don’t know if it was from the packing or handling during shipment but I would recommend shipping the lamp and shades separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amin Jai

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: good price and looks nice, easy to put together, one when in #2 bedroom and one in my office area.
customer_reviews.author: David Mardis

customer_reviews.title: How do I get help on this?????
customer_reviews.text: Like the lamps do not want to return them one shade is however all puckered up on the bottom. I would like a replacement for that shade.
customer_reviews.author: Jan C.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my daughters bedroom and I chose white to pair with the dark blue walls. I also considered the height of the lamps because of the high ceiling and room size. Wow, the room looked like a fancy hotel room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamps
customer_reviews.text: The Safavieh white 32" lamps are beautiful. They are very tall and elegant. The packaging was perfect. I put the lamps together in two minutes. I absolutely love the way they look in my bedroom. Great lamps for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: These lamps are beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing to dislike about this set of lamps.
customer_reviews.author: mrsbo

customer_reviews.title: Great size and love the variety of color options
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size of these table lamps. They are easy to assemble, great price and size!! Will be ordering these again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the lamps in white. The lamps are truly beautiful, gave it a 4STAR, would have given it a 5 but the top of one of my lamps is not straight it is slatted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful! We absolutely love the shape and white color
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful! We absolutely love the shape and white color. They are a bit larger than expected but we didn't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to new den furnishings.
customer_reviews.text: Love my lamps! Priced several before purchasing these and paid less for 2 than 1 of others of similar style. Very pleased with quality of items!
customer_reviews.author: Staci Lyerly

customer_reviews.title: Great large orange lamps
customer_reviews.text: Great size and fabulous color. Priced right. Gift for picky sister was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Crocker

customer_reviews.title: You will love this product. Great value & great lamps
customer_reviews.text: Lamps were beautiful. Color orange was very nice. Height was perfect. Loved the lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Ce Ce

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: A QUALITY product at a reasonable price You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: BWD

customer_reviews.title: Picture not deceiving! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE MY LAMPS!! Just as awesome in person as the pic!
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful lamps. They are large but look great in my room!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Eftink

customer_reviews.title: The color is not as dark compared in the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is not as dark compared in the picture and one of the shade has a yellow stain . I decided to keep it because too much hassle to ship it back...
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Estival

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size lamps and excellent value for the price. Color is a true navy.
customer_reviews.author: Ana-Mari C.

customer_reviews.title: flaws in finish
customer_reviews.text: ORANGE LAMPS Color - very close to picture, just a bit less intense. This is a rich orange, not a neon screaming orange. Finish - one lamp was fine, other has pock marks or small bubbles in orange coating and two dark brown spots. Very disappointing. Base - clear crystal-like plastic. Lamp is heavy, so sturdy. Shades - White linen type. One shade has some frayed edges embedded in the trim detail that show up when the lamp is turned on, but was able to hide this in the back. Disappointed in the finish of one of the lamps, but overall very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: VSmith

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 star but.....
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are beautiful. Better than anything else I have seen in this price range. Only problem was that the shades were damaged during shipping. So consider that you will have to purchase new shades if you order these. The box looked fine on the outside but somehow the shades were dented in numerous places and obviously looked terrible. Since I loved the lamps I did not want to go through return process. I have had very poor luck with Amazon returns so I find it easy to eat the expense than deal with the frustration it causes me. So with new shades these lamps are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MJO2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamps!  Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lamps! Just moved into a new house... Trying to get things decorated, and these fit the room perfectly! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: craigford

customer_reviews.title: Nice tall lamps
customer_reviews.text: These are BIG lamps. I really like them in my living room. The navy is dark and is a good contrast to the white shades. The bases and finial tops are clear like crystal. Lovely!
customer_reviews.author: C. Medine

customer_reviews.title: Grand lamps
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these lamps look. I bought them for my nightstands because I have a high bed and these were the tallest table lamps I could find. The pop of color looks great. I would have given these lamps 5 stars but I feel like one lamp of the pair was a "second" (the box indicates they came from Overstock.com) The finish on one lamp has some bumps and one lamp shade has a couple brownish spots.
customer_reviews.author: Momala

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Hated The packaging love the lamps. They are quite tall for bedroom lamps but they work and they actually provide some light for reading in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E. Mcgehee

customer_reviews.title: ANGELIC WHITE 4 an ICY 🐝‘a ROOM!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT ADDITION TO MY ALL WHITE BEDROOM! Larger than expected, which is fine, just may want a larger bedside table than what I’m workin’ with!
customer_reviews.author: mysterymm7

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: The lamps look better in real than they do online. Everyone who comes into my home are captivated by their beauty.
customer_reviews.author: rc

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love to buy Safavieh items. Big fan. This is the third purchase of this brand that I have bought on Amazon and I wasn't disappointed. Great buy.....Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Trudi P.

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with this pair of lamps
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this pair of lamps. The color is vivid, the height is impressive, the lamps anchor two corners of our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Moore

customer_reviews.title: The color is perfect for my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are very large in size, but look ok on my night tables. The color is perfect for my bedroom. I am quite happy with the lamps, but wish they had a 3-way switch as I use them to read at night and would like a brighter blub.
customer_reviews.author: Seachel

customer_reviews.title: great looking for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a dark navy blue to set off the light grey walls. These worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective Materials
customer_reviews.text: The ceramic was defective on the base of the lamp. Now I get to repackage the lamps (which is going to be a mess) and return to UPS. Ugggg...
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: The base came in cracked. The color of lamp Perfect. A beautiful orange.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.K.

customer_reviews.title: These lamps are huge but beautiful. I had to send them back because of ...
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is they were too big for a bedroom. These lamps are huge but beautiful. I had to send them back because of their size only. Shipped pretty fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these before and the best I can say is these are QUALITY lamps and shades. you won't be dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and great quality lamps! Perfect on my nightstands, great size. Best packed product I think I’ve ever seen! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice at an affordable price. They look great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Lee L.

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. Look chic. Their products are absolute quality. No complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect color and style
customer_reviews.text: The color and shape of these gourd are the perfect accents in my new living room. I was looking for tall lamps that would not interfere with the line of sight for conversation. They provide the perfect lighting to provide good reading and balanced lighting in my livingroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamps!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lamps! They are lovely! I got them in teal & they give off a warm cozy glow! Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lamps, larger than I expected. Very happy overall. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnielle

customer_reviews.title: THE LAMPS ARE BEAUTIFUL. I COULDN''T HAVE GOTTEN A BETTER DEAL
customer_reviews.text: THE LAMPS ARE BEAUTIFUL. I COULDN''T HAVE GOTTEN A BETTER DEAL.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Smith

product_meta.title: Safavieh Lighting Collection Blanche Gourd White 32-inch Table Lamp (Set of 2)
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteGraceful and curvaceous, the blanche gourd lamp is sure to illuminate any room with elegance and style. Its classic body glistens in white glazed ceramic is accented with silver-finished neck and acrylic base, and topped with a white cotton drum shade.
feature_bullets: This lamp is crafted of ceramic
Perfect for a living room, bedroom, den, library, study or office
For over 100 years, Safavieh has been crafting products of the highest quality and unmatched style
To clean, wipe with a soft, dry cloth; Avoid the use of chemicals and household cleaners as they may damage the finish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars45 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
